NHS palettes

Source: R/theme_nhs.R
nhs_palette.Rd

NHS palettes

Usage

nhs_palettes

nhs_brewer_palettes

Format

An object of class list of length 26.

An object of class list of length 23.

Examples

nhs_palettes
#> $nhs_primary
#> [1] "#005EB8" "#FFFFFF"
#> 
#> $nhs_blue_tones
#> [1] "#003087" "#005EB8" "#0072CE" "#41B6E6" "#00A9CE"
#> 
#> $nhs_neutrals
#> [1] "#231f20" "#425563" "#768692" "#E8EDEE"
#> 
#> $nhs_support_greens
#> [1] "#006747" "#009639" "#78BE20" "#00A499"
#> 
#> $nhs_highlights
#> [1] "#330072" "#7C2855" "#AE2573" "#8A1538" "#ED8B00" "#FFB81C" "#FAE100"
#> 
#> $nhs_dark_blues
#> [1] "#CCD5E7" "#99ACCF" "#6682B7" "#33599F" "#003087"
#> 
#> $nhs_blues

#>
